m_szDocSumamry: Q: Where will the money come from if nobody works? A: Money is created as energy. : BasicIncome  303132DiscussionQ: Where will the money come from if nobody works? A: Money is created as energy. (self.BasicIncome)submitted 4 months ago * by wattQ: Where will the money come from after nobody has a job (because of automation), and there's no incomes to tax? How do we make sure that UBI allowance is not eaten by inflation? A: Restate the individual's basic income as budget in terms of energy (i.e., kWh of electricity). This article is also discussion of nature of money, and in a way also argument
